tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Today, when I went to the clinic, Dr. Vishakha was not there, but she arrived within 5 minutes. First, we greeted each other and then she called me up in order to proceed with the treatment.

Then, she checked my tooth, if there was any pain or not. After which she explained me about the procedure, that it could be sensitive too. 
Once it was done, she explained me about the do's and don'ts that I should follow.

During the course, she was calm, focused and careful too. So, that I don't get hurt in anyway.
She treated me like her own childðŸ¥°ðŸ¥°.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I got my Smile Treatment done from Dr. Vishakha Gupta. I am pleased to inform that from Start till the end of the treatment I have had a very pleasant experience. Dr. Vishakha knows her job very well and was always very patient to listen to all my queries and doubts. With such contentment the whole treatment went very smooth and gratifying.  And the Outcome came so good that I often receive Compliments on my Smile from friends and even strangers. Thank You Dr. Vishakha !  I will strongly recommend her Professional Dentistry Work to everyone.  Let me add that they have One of the Most Modern Facility to undertake their job Masterly as a true professional 
Manjit Singh Saini
CEO & Executive Director - PARAMOUNT Group

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Dental Deep Cleaning,
review: I like the recommendations by the doctor when I presented my case of decayed tooth through a video call from overseas. My case of chronic tooth pain caused by the decay of a tilted wisdom tooth handled perfectly. She took her time to explain my condition and my treatment options, out of which we decided to go with RCT. Additionally I got tips on how to maintain oral hygiene and usage of specific tooth paste and tooth cream as a preventive measure. I would recommend Dr. Vishakha.
reply_text:
THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK. 
HAPPY TO HELP

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Absolutely amazing and wonderful experience. The journey of the treatment went from being anxious to being excited. Doctor Vishakha builds up a repo with the patient smoothly and explains the health issue very clearly using models and explanatory videos. She moves with the pace of the patient keeping the patient to the utmost comfort level. The experience of 10000+ RCTs is clearly visible. Totally recommend Dr Vishakha for RCT treatments.
